actions.when: me.level == 99 and not me.is_mastered and not hasBuff('Commitment') and canUseItem(vars.use_xp_cp_rings.cp_rings)
actions.comment: Use the first available CP ring if we don't alredy have the Commitment effect. Only used if level 99 and not in the master levels.

actions.when: me.level < 99 and not hasBuff('Dedication') and canUseItem(vars.use_xp_cp_rings.xp_rings)
actions.comment: Use the first available EXP ring if we don't have the Dedication effect. Only used if level is below 99.
